choices: Your 42 year old uncle Daniel
Your 17 year old cousin Jake
Your 14 year old cousin Brayden
Your 12 year old cousin Ezra
1.content:
After a long airplane ride and car ride you finally arrive at your uncle's house you walk up to the door and ring the doorbell while waiting for someone to answer you start to feel dizzy and soon you pass out when you wake up you realize everything is GIGANTIC you soon understand that you have shrunk you stand there wondering how this happened a noise snaps you out of your thoughts you look up to see who


Who answered the door?
1.title: You've arrived

choices: He sees you and picks you up
He doesn't see you at all
11.content:
You look up and see your Uncle Daniel he has a stained white tank top and pajama pants his somewhat short brown hair is a mess and his beard seems like it hasn't been shaved in ages after a few minutes he scratches his head in confusion from seeing no one at the door he then looks down.


What happens next?
11.title: Your 42 year old uncle Daniel

choices: He realizes it's you and takes you inside
He thinks your a bug and throws you on the ground
He thinks your some sort of toy and gives you to Ezra
111.content:
You feel you uncle pick you up with his warm sweaty hand he lifts you up to his face and looks at you carefully





What happens next?
111.title: He sees you and picks you up

choices: He decides to help you
He doesn't help you and makes you his slave
He doesn't know what to do and gives you to one of your cousins
1111.content:
(Y/N) = Your Name



After taking a few good looks at you he realizes it's you and he takes you inside he then sets you down and looks down at you "So (Y/N) how did this happen to you" Your Uncle Daniel asks with a confused look on his face honestly you had no idea how this happened so that's what you told him "I have no idea how this happened but you've got to help me Uncle Daniel please" You ask pretty much begging at this point



What does Daniel do?
1111.title: He realizes it's you and takes you inside

choices: He puts you into his sock
He puts you into his underwear
He gives you to one of your cousins
11111.content:
Your uncle looks at you while thinking "Alright (Y/N) I'll help you but before I do I have to go to work" he says as he starts to walk upstairs. He enters his room and starts to get dressed after he's done he looks at you trying to figure out where to put you




Where does your uncle decide to put you?
11111.title: He decides to help you

choices: He forces you to lick his feet
He looks at his boner and grabs you
11112.content:
After you beg and plead for your uncle to help you he gets an evil grin on his face he then says "Sorry (Y/N) but there's no way I'm gonna miss out on an opportunity to have my own personal slave" he says while chuckling he then drops you onto the coffee table he then puts up his feet you look at them in disgust as they smell and look horrible your uncle laughs when he sees your disgusted face he then smirks "Yeah take a whiff of that kid I haven't taken a shower in about two or three weeks" he says as he starts to laugh he then stops laughing and looks down at you again "What the hell are you waiting for get to rubbing my feet" he says in a demanding voice seeing no way out of this you start to rub your uncle's sweaty dirty feet you try not to pass out due to the cheesy smell after what feels like an eternity but was actually thirty minutes your done with both feet you then look up at your uncle



What does he decide to do with you now?
11112.title: He doesn't help you and makes you his slave

choices: He's going back inside
He's lowering his barefoot to squish you
1112.content:
Your uncle looks at you closely and doesn't recognize you he assume you're a bug he then throws you onto the ground somehow you were still alive but you open your eyes and see your Uncle Daniel







What is he doing?
1112.title: He thinks your a bug and throws you on the ground

choices: Ezra is excited and takes you
Ezra doesn't take you
Ezra realizes it's you and tells his dad
1113.content:
Your uncle looks at you and you try to stay as still as possible and it works but unfortunately for you due to how still you were standing your uncle thought you were some sort of really tiny action figure so he then calls you younger cousin Ezra downstairs after a few seconds you see Ezra rush down the stairs he then looks at his dad "hey dad what's up" Ezra says in an energetic tone your uncle then lowers his hand to reveal you to Ezra "I found this cool little toy outside so I was wondering if you wanted it"




Does Ezra take you?
1113.title: He thinks your some sort of toy and gives you t...

choices: Try to climb him to get his attention
Wait for him to notice you on his foot
Try to get his attention from where you are
112.content:
Your uncle looks down and you wait for him to notice and pick you up but it never happens you look up and see him walking inside you quickly grab onto his foot which smells extremely bad like it hasn't been washed in weeks your try to hold onto his foot for as long as possibly he then sits down and all of the movement stops you then try to figure out what to do




What should you do?
112.title: He doesn't see you at all

choices: He sees you and smirks
He looks down in confusion
He doesn't see you at all
12.content:
You look up and see your older cousin Jake in nothing but his underwear which isn't uncommon for Jake since he is extremely self-confidant he's your typical high school jock he's captain of the football team and a major bully who will only do something for someone if it benefits him he looks confused until he looks down


What happens next?
12.title: Your 17 year old cousin Jake

choices: He demands you to worship his feet
He grabs you and puts you on his chest and messes with you
He grabs you and puts you in his underwear
121.content:
He picks you up and takes you inside he then goes into his room where he sits you down on his bed looks at you and pokes you laughing he starts to lay down in his bed and put his feet up you almost pass out due to the disgusting smell





What does he do?
121.title: He sees you and smirks

choices: Jake doesn't help you
Jake helps you
Jake agrees to help if you do something for him first
122.content:
(Y/N) = Your name

Jake looks down at you in confusion he then picks you up and looks at you closely "(Y/N) what the hell happened to you" Jake asks while still inspecting you "I d-don't know Jake b-but you have to help me" you say stuttering due to your sudden size change and also due to the fact that your in the hands of you older cousin who is a major bully and probably won't help you unless it benefits him in some way



Does Jake help you?
122.title: He looks down in confusion

choices: You make it and grab onto Jake
You make it into the house before the door closes
You get trapped outside
123.content:
You look up and see your cousin Jake look down you hope he sees you so you can ask him for help he then turns to walk inside you then realize he didn't see you, You then run to the door hoping to either get onto Jake or into the house before the door closes





What happens?
123.title: He doesn't see you at all

choices: He sees you and is confused
He sees you and gets a big smile on his face
He doesn't see you at all
13.content:
You look up and see you cousin Brayden he's wearing a black tank top and basketball shorts he looks like he just woke up due to his messy brown hair anyway you were relived when you saw Brayden because since you two were the same age and got along well most of the time the only thing you didn't like about him was that he was a messy slob who rarely showered and he was extremely cocky so it would be hard to get help from him but you tried anyway you started to call up to him he then looks down



What happens next?
13.title: Your 14 year old cousin Brayden

choices: He takes you inside to help you
He takes you to his room to torture you
He shares you with Ezra and they both torture you
131.content:
You see Brayden crouch down to get a better look at you he then he then loudly asks "DUDE WHAT THE HELL HAPPENED TO YOU". You cover your ears due to the screaming from him you then look up at him and reply "I don't know how this happened and also could you stop yelling" Brayden Apologizes and laughs after he's done laughing he grabs you and brings you closer to his face "so what should I do with you" he asks while looking at you closely. You look at him dumbfounded "What do you think you should do with me Brayden help me" You say irritated





What does Brayden do with you?
131.title: He sees you and is confused

choices: He doesn't help you and uses you as a slave to worship him
He decides to help you on his own
He agrees to help you and brings you to one of his smart friends
132.content:
(Y/N) = Your Name


You see your cousin kneel down to look at you as soon as he realizes who you are he gets a huge smile on his face "Holy Shit (Y/N) what the heck happened to you" Brayden asks rather loudly "I don't know Brayden I knocked on the door and suddenly I shrunk but dude you've got to help me" You plead Brayden thinks for a while before he picks you up



What does he decide to do?
132.title: He sees you and gets a big smile on his face

choices: He sees you and smiles
He sees you and thinks your a bug
He doesn't see you at all
14.content:
You look up and see your little cousin Ezra who is wearing a t-shirt and shorts with a confused look on his face he then looks down





What happens next
14.title: Your 12 year old cousin Ezra

choices: He takes you up to his room
He tries to find a way to help you
He gives you to someone else
141.content:
(Y/N) = Your Name


You see Ezra with a huge smile on his face as he picks you up "Holy crap (Y/N) how did you get so tiny you're probably smaller then one of my action figures" He says while laughing "Ezra please you have to find a way to help please"





What does Ezra do?
141.title: He sees you and smiles

choices: He takes you to his room to experiment on/torture you
He is uninterested and he tosses you on the ground
142.content:
Ezra looks at you and thinks your some sort of weird bug he picks you and inspects you closer "Whoa what the heck are you" He asks curiously Ezra realizes he's never seen this type of bug before







What does he decide to do with you?
142.title: He sees you and thinks your a bug

info.brief_description: You suddenly shrink when you visit your uncle and his sons for the holidays
info.description: Your a 14 year old boy who decides to visit your uncle and his sons for the holidays when suddenly you shrink as soon as you knock on the door what will you do or better yet what will they do
